executiveSummary: Rosa, founder of Wild Wonder, pitched her sparkling prebiotic and probiotic beverage line inspired by traditional Chinese healing tonics to the Sharks, seeking $500,000 for 5% equity. After most Sharks opted out due to concerns about valuation and the challenges of the beverage industry, Tony Xu made a deal for $500,000 for 6% equity plus 3% advisory shares, marking a successful investment for Rosa.
keyDecisions: Tony Xu invested $500,000 for 6% equity and 3% advisory shares in Wild Wonder.
nextSteps: Rosa and Tony Xu will collaborate to scale Wild Wonder, leveraging Tonyâ€™s expertise in capital-efficient business growth.
